moreBlocks.otherOffices: Rhoads & Rhoads, P.S.C. 9 East Center Street Madisonville, KY 42431 270-731-3187

description:
Experienced attorney Jerry Rhoads founded the law firm of Rhoads & Rhoads in 1974 with the goal of providing the people of Owensboro and surrounding Western Kentucky with high-quality legal services in the areas of personal injury, Social Security Disability and workers' compensation. Today, over 40 years later, we continue to work toward that original goal.

Our firm's doors first opened in Madisonville, and, in 1996, thanks to our long record of success and reputation for dedication to our clients, we opened our Owensboro law office. In the nearly 20 years that have passed since we opened our Owensboro location, we have earned a reputation for being a leader in our practice areas.

Today, our firm has grown not only in the number of offices that it has, but also in the number of attorneys who we have on staff. Today, we have seven highly experienced attorneys on staff who proudly serve the people of Western Kentucky who need our assistance.

Whether your injuries stem from a car crash or a workplace accident, the lawyers at Rhoads & Rhoads can assist you as you pursue personal injury compensation, workers' compensation or Social Security Disability. If you would like to learn more about the services offered at our law firm, you can take advantage of our offer for a free consultation.
